Package io.xmljim.algorithms.model.util

Class SerialDate

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Number
io.xmljim.algorithms.model.util.SerialTemporal
io.xmljim.algorithms.model.util.SerialDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<SerialTemporal>
public final class SerialDate
extends SerialTemporal
A numeric representation of a LocalDate. The numeric representation is stored as Epoch Seconds (the number of seconds since January 1, 1970). SerialDate extends from number and can be used as a Scalar value
See Also:
Serialized Form
